title: Fresh water from the sea
creator_credit: Hearst Metrotone and United States Information Service
brief_description: Serious water shortages everywhere have led scientists to seek to transform sea water into fresh water. Two of these conversion plants, one in San Diego, California and the other in Freeport, Texas, are shown in operation.
